CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 3, 1955, pg. A7, reads: "Happy Pair - The wedding of Rose Crawford, 3359 McNeil Place, and Meredith Diggs, 1242 Liverpool Street, took place 7:30 pg. M., Nov. 26, at the brides' home, with the Rev. C. E. Talley officiating. The bride is the daughter of Flourina Crawford.  Her bridegroom is the son of Mr. and Mrs. John Diggs.  Lillian Johnson was maid of honor.  James Crawford, the bride's brother, was best man. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of masked out individual, groom Meredith Diggs wearing dark suit and knit tie, bride Rose Crawford Diggs wearing light colored with with wide embroidered collar and pearl necklace, and woman wearing satin dress, possibly Lillian Johnson, in Crawford home, 3359 McNeil Place, Hill District
